name: FireStreak (Roman Grzegorzewski)
description:
Play and try to survive the longer you can without touching birds, ground or other missiles in this game for one to four players through two game modes.

This game was created with the following rules in mind as a challenge :

only two buttons, exactly one minute, only black and white pixels, screen of 128 x 128 pixels, Multiplayer up to 3 players, online leaderboard... and we did them all !

Made by Grzegorzewski Roman, Leroy Benjamin and Horion Raphaël
